10 Mar 2013 Life Lankar

To Live, To Life

In the myterious equations of love that any logic or reasons can be found. you are the only reason I am. You are all the reason.

Enjoy writing

At some point, I begin to rethink the meanings of writing. It seems to me that it's not only the memories of carrier, but also it organize my thoughts, enlightened and inspired ideas. Especially for the developers, it's important to form the habit of summarization and conclusion. Under the cover of darkness, a suitable desk accompanied with a laptop, beside a cup of tea. In the warm light, the smell of tea flow with mind. It's just perfect!

Just go ahead

So long
